text:
I am using jakarta-poi-1.7.0-dev-bin.zip, 
and HSSFCell method getStringCellValue throws a NumberFormatException if a cell 
is numeric. However, there are custom formats one may specify on a numeric 
field. For example, a phone number would be displayed in a certain way, and not 
as a double 1.11111111E8. I have to generate a report from an xls file, and 
need a way to format numeric fields. Please advise on a way to do this.
Thanks,
creator: elvira_gurevich@ibi.com
poi-support@buni.org
text:
ask this question on the list.  I don't think this is a bug and this description
is insufficient for a bug report.
